title: Chest border notification gone in my client
body:
I don't see the border around champ for which I've received award and I don't see any info when I hover over it. Is this a bug?
If not how can I see which champs I won the chest for and which not.

replies.body: That honestly sounds like you may have a corrupt file going on in your client! If you run a[ Hextech Repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), it should repair the file so that you're able to see the chests you have won. Let me know if that doesn't work for you and i'll dig a little deeper.
